Package edu.smcm.ai.search

This package contains classes that implement a set of abstract classes for classical search problems.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Abstract parent class of all actions.
    BeamSearch
    An implementation of the Beam Search.
    HillClimbing
    Implementation of the Hill Climbing Search.
    LinearSchedule
    A linear cooling schedule.
    LocalSearch
    A generic class for local search algorithms.
    LocalSearchState
    Abstract representation of a state for local searches.
    Schedule
    An abstract class for the cooling schedule used in simulated annealing searches.
    SimulatedAnnealing
    Implemementation of the Simulating Annealing Search.
    State
    A class to represent a state of the environment in a search problem.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalAction
    An Exception that is thrown when an illegal action is performed.

Package edu.smcm.ai.search Description

This package contains classes that implement a set of abstract classes for classical search problems. It also provides specific implementations of some of those algorithms. See Russell and Norvig, Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach, Third Edition, Chapter 3.
